Keep Track of Important Stuff in Your Life!

Arguments/Discussions

Tired of forgetting older arguments? Arguments that are thrown at you after 2 years? Keep track of all what was said and argued at one place!!

Lies Spoken

Do you think your SO is lying to you about something?Easy to track lies for you to refer later to verify the truth..

Promises Made

Are you one of those lazy ass who keeps forgetting the promises? Has it happened with you that you lost an argument because your SO told you about a promise you made, a promise that you dont remember?

Track Important Dates

Did your wife just threw the remote on you because you forgot the birthday of her mother? Were you supposed to make the night special because your SO is expecting you to get naughty on your "first time" anniversary?

Track All Stats

Keep a track of the arguments you were involved in this week/month/year. How many lies did your SO speak? Are you sure you are not over committing by making promises after promises??

Sex Counter

You should aspire to fuck more than you argue. Keep a track on your personal sex-meter and compare it with the fights you had in the same period! Lust begets Lust!!!
